pages.title: ℧ Nine of Cups ℧
pages.text: Spirit of Material Happiness$(br)     ♃ Jupiter in ♓ Pisces

A content fellow has feasted to their heart's content, and abundant refreshment of wine is on the arched counter behind them, seeming to indicate that the future is also assured.$(br)  The table cloth is the deep blue of mystery and the unconscious.$(br)  Water is the element of fantasy and emotion. We nourish our bodies daily, yet we also spend a great deal of our time and energy on satiating our desires.

$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Desire, beauty, sensual pleasure - or possibly, the perfection of art.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Frustration, mistakes, regrets.$(br)  Over-indulgence on personal desires and fantasies.
